function_description: Add a new board to a project
initial_state: User is logged in and has project manager rights. User is on the dashboard view or has the sidebar visible.
steps: Hover over the project name to reveal the three dot button (context menu).
Click the three dot button to open the quick menu.
Follow the prompts to configure and name the new board.
expected_state: A new board is created within the selected project and is accessible from the project view.
